question: Who has become the second player in the world to play 100 T20 internationals?
explanation: Stand-in captain Rohit Sharma is going to be the first Indian player and second in world cricket to complete 100 T20 Internationals. Shoaib Malik (111 games) from Pakistan is the only player to have played more than 100 T20 Internationals. Women\'s team captain Harmanpreet Kaur recently achieved the milestone during India\'s series against South Africa in Surat.Â
